backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing site ownership, admin authorization, user profiles, order creation and management, and contact message storage with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required fixes and associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for three high-confidence features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes defining layout, colors, and component styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with layout, public routes, admin routes, and global error handling using GlobalErrorBoundary and GlobalErrorFallbackPage.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that handles authentication, ownership verification, login prompts, and conditional access to admin pages with detailed UI states.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: Displays Bitcoin payment details for an order with copy-to-clipboard actions for order ID, address, and amount.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: A React error boundary that captures errors, logs them safely, and renders a provided fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/error/SafeSectio: Wraps UI sections in an error boundary to prevent non‑critical failures from breaking the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, footer, and conditional admin link handling.
frontend/src/components/orders/RecentOrd: Shows a dropdown of recent orders with status, loading states, and links to order details.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Renders selectable gift card denomination cards using BTC rate data and discount calculations.
Displays the minimum and maximum supported denominations in a styled callout.
A dropdown selector for choosing a USDT denomination from supported values.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: A quantity selector component with increment, decrement, and direct numeric input constrained by min/max values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBtcUsdtRate.ts: Fetches and auto-refreshes the BTC/USDT rate with caching, fallback logic, and status info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Loads and syncs persisted order history with safe error handling and storage event updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistoryDetail: Fetches detailed order data for multiple order IDs using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on orders and contact messages using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the application.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with cards explaining the company, its offerings, and how the service works. Provides descriptive text and icon-enhanced sections about features and platform security.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactMes: Admin page listing customer contact messages with loading and error states, presented in a table format.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page that loads a single order, displays its details, and allows updating its status with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin dashboard page that lists all orders with status badges, error handling, and navigation to order details and messages.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays the gift card catalog with denomination selection, quantity input, product details, and checkout initiation. Saves the cart session and navigates users to the checkout page.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, validates user input, creates orders, calculates BTC amounts with discounts, and shows payment instructions. Manages cart session cleanup and error handling during order creation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form to submit inquiries, handling form state, validation, success alerts, and API mutation errors. Resets inputs after successful message submission.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders a FAQ page using an accordion layout covering common questions about gift cards, payments, delivery, discounts, and order tracking.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalErrorFallbackPa: Displays a global error fallback UI with reload and home navigation options, showing error details in development mode.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, product highlights, and navigation to the catalog and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a user's past orders with status, loading states, and links to catalog or detailed order info.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Displays detailed status and payment info for a specific order, including BTC-to-USDT estimates and status icons.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Provides an input form for users to enter an order ID and navigate to its status page.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: Utilities for saving, loading, and clearing cart data in sessionStorage with basic error handling.
frontend/src/state/orderHistory.ts: LocalStorage-backed order history manager with in-memory fallback, supporting add, update, load, and remove operations.
frontend/src/utils/denominations.ts: Exports the list of supported gift card denominations.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utility functions for normalizing, formatting, and categorizing errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Maps backend order statuses to simplified labels and badge variants for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Pricing utilities for discounts and USDT/BTC conversions, including formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage with optional clearing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, layout settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including issues and feature requirements related to diagnosing and fixing a production load crash.
